DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics SB1578 healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male and/or female nonchildbearing potential , 18 55 year age ( inclusive ) . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18.5 ≤ 29.9 ( kg/m2 ) weight 55 100 kg ( inclusive ) . Medically healthy clinically insignificant screen result . History presence significant disease .
